price: Mi ćemo, doista, pomoći poslanike Naše i vjernike u životu na ovom svijetu, a i na Dan kad se dignu svjedoci,
arabic: إِنَّا لَنَنصُرُ رُسُلَنَا وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَيَوۡمَ يَقُومُ ٱلۡأَشۡهَٰدُ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā lananṣuru rusulanā wa-alladhīna āmanū fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā wayawma yaqūmu al-ashhādu
